category: Public Architectural Review Committee Regulations/Article 4 (Committee Composition)
contents: Article 4 (Committee composition) ① The committee shall be composed of the following members. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 2 vice chairpersons *3. 5 to 11 members (including the chairperson and vice-chairperson) ② The committee is composed with gender balance in mind. ③ The committee shall be composed of experts in the fields of architectural planning, architectural design, urbanism and landscaping, and the majority shall be comprised of experts in the fields of architectural planning and architectural design. ④ In addition to the areas specified in paragraph 3, the Committee may hear opinions from experts in civil engineering, electricity, communications, machinery, etc. in order to receive advice necessary for design and construction. ⑤ The committee shall have one secretary, who shall be appointed by the president from among the staff of the Sports Council.
